title: A Fine Balance - library and recital hall

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Mistry uses literary elements and techniques to convey Dina’s complex response to these places.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Mistry uses literary elements and techniques to convey Dina’s complex response to these places.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
